modules.description: Maintains a persistent key-value store using a file-based backend, allowing retrieval, insertion, and deletion of entries. It operates on strings for keys and serialized OCaml values for values. Used to store application state across sessions or share data between processes.

The module provides a foundation for managing inventory-related operations through a set of specialized components. It includes data types such as items, quantities, and locations, along with operations for adding, removing, and querying stock. Functions enable tracking of inventory levels and generating reports. Example tasks include updating item counts and retrieving details for specific products.
